1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Lower and upper bound.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.MinMax
6 ( MinMax (..),
7   atLeast, atMost,
8   times,
9 ) where
10
11-- | Lower and upper bound.
12data MinMax
13  = Min    Int            -- ^ Lower bound and unlimited upper bound
14  | MinMax Int Int        -- ^ Lower and upper bound
15    deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
16
17-- | Lower bound.
18lowerBound :: MinMax -> Int
19lowerBound (Min n)      = n
20lowerBound (MinMax n _) = n
21
22-- | Test lower bound.
23--
24--   >>> atLeast 1 $ Min 0
25--   False
26--
27--   >>> atLeast 1 $ Min 1
28--   True
29
30atLeast :: Int -> MinMax -> Bool
31atLeast b m = (lowerBound m) >= b
32
33-- | Test upper bound.
34atMost :: Int -> MinMax -> Bool
35atMost _ (Min _)      = False
36atMost b (MinMax _ n) = n <= b
37
38-- | Compose nested min-max.
39--
40--   >>> MinMax 2 4 `times` MinMax 3 5
41--   MinMax 6 20
42--
43--   >>> MinMax 2 4 `times` Min 3
44--   Min 6
45
46times :: MinMax -> MinMax -> MinMax
47times (MinMax a b) (MinMax x y)  = MinMax (a * x) (b * y)
48times (Min    a)   (Min    x)    = Min    (a * x)
49times (MinMax a _) (Min    x)    = Min    (a * x)
50times (Min    a)   (MinMax x _)  = Min    (a * x)
